sentences.cn: 海军五星上将威廉∙亨特

sentences.en: He abused the Admiral in the grossest terms.
sentences.cn: 他用不堪入耳的话辱骂那位海军上将。

sentences.en: He had never met a real live admiral.
sentences.cn: 他从来没遇到过一位真正的海军上将。

sentences.en: He was hand-picked for this job by the Admiral.
sentences.cn: 他是由海军上将精心挑选出来担任这项工作的。

sentences.en: In olden days, of course, a flag-lieutenant was in charge of the Admiral's signal flags.
sentences.cn: 当然在过去，副官掌管着舰队司令的信号旗。

sentences.en: Just ask the Admiral if he will be good enough to drop me a note.
sentences.cn: 就问一问那位海军上将，是否可以有劳他给我留个便条。

sentences.en: Most of them were led by the famous eunuch admiral Cheng - ho.
sentences.cn: 大多数使团都是由著名的舰队司令,宦官郑和率领的.

sentences.en: Now It'seemed he might not even make rear admiral!
sentences.cn: 现在看来他连个海军少将也未必当得上.

sentences.en: Rear Admiral Spruance strolled in and asked what the matter was.
sentences.cn: 斯普鲁思斯海军少将踱进室来,问到底是怎么回事.

sentences.en: Shortly afterwards Admiral Harwood learnt that the ship was weighing anchor.
sentences.cn: 嗣后不久,哈伍德海军上将获悉船在起锚了.

sentences.en: The admiral has written a book about his experience on the sea.
sentences.cn: 这位海军上将写了一本有关他海上阅历的书.

sentences.en: The admiral visited the ships under his command.
sentences.cn: 舰队司令视察了他所统率的军舰。
海军上将在欢迎他的哨子声中登舰.

sentences.en: The admiral, a surprisingly small man, held out a small scrubbed hand.
sentences.cn: 上将的个子小得出乎意外, 他伸出一只干净的小手.

sentences.en: You, Livesey, are ship's doctor; I am admiral.
sentences.cn: 你, 利维塞, 就当随船医生, 而我算是司令官.

words.tran_cn: 海军部；海事法庭；海军上将的职位
海军上将；舰队司令；[军][船]旗舰

trans.tran_cn: 海军将领，舰队司令，旗舰，渔船队长，商船队长
trans.tran_en: a high rank in the British or US navy, or someone with this rank
